Question.Subject: How often does Lockerz restock? When is the next time they will?
Question.Content:
Also, how fast do the items run out?
Just started today so I have a few questions...Thanks(:
Question.ChosenAnswer: Items run out of stock real quick. They choose a random date for the redemption's I suggest you to use LockerzAlerts - http://www.lockerzalerts.com service , they will send you text message to your mobile phone when the redemption occurs ! its also FREE !

Answer.Content: Items run out of stock real quick. They choose a random date for the redemption's I suggest you to use LockerzAlerts - http://www.lockerzalerts.com service , they will send you text message to your mobile phone when the redemption occurs ! its also FREE !

Generally they take a month to restock, but when the redemtions are on, lockerzalerts.com will send you a text saying so
